Package index

Get Data

get_connected()
Define RODBC connection to Oracle
get_specimen_data()
Pull AFSC Shellfish Assessment Program Bering Sea survey data
get_male_maturity()
Pull proportion morphometrically mature Chionoecetes spp. males by size

Design-Based Index and Composition Estimation

calc_cpue()
Calculate haul-level catch per unit effort
calc_bioabund()
Calculate index of station-, district-, or region-level abundance and biomass

Utility Functions

set_crab_category()
Assign size-sex-maturity categories based on species- and district-specific size definitions
set_variables()
Helper function to set optional variables and subset data
